root.name: Rooms: The Main Building
root.description: OverviewRooms: The Main Building is a sliding-block puzzle game, with elements of point and click adventure. The game was developed by HandMade Games and published by Hudson Entertainment; it was initially released for PC in 2008, with Wii and DS versions being released in 2010. The game tasks the player with guiding a man through a series of levels that are divided into sliding rooms, these rooms must be moved around in order to allow a safe passage to the exit door.
